description.@en: I’ve always spoken with the shadows, and they speak to me of a greater darkness at play here.

data.notes:
Mage Trait

Professions of this Archetype make use of strange healing arts, plumb the depths of the supernatural and study Spells. They come from all walks of life and have sacrificed some part of their humanity to further their aims.

effect.@en: You can use any Fellowship-based Skill to directly communicate with Abyssal threats you can see and hear clearly. This empathy acts as an all but paranormal type of communication, the complexity determined by the Historian. In addition, you are immune to being Compelled (a Trait that some threats possess)..
